structure.unit: ARTICLE III. SOUTH FLORIDA FIRE PREVENTION CODE

law.catch_line: Short title; adoption by reference; applicability.

text.section:
Sec. 14-40. Short title; adoption by reference; applicability.
The South Florida Fire Prevention Code is hereby adopted by reference as if fully set forth herein, as said code may be amended from time to time.
The South Florida Fire Prevention Code may hereinafter be referred to as the "S.F.F.P.C."
The S.F.F.P.C. as amended from time to time, and this article, as amended from time to time, shall be applicable in both the incorporated and unincorporated areas of Dade County, Florida. All references in this article to the S.F.F.P.C. and this article shall be deemed respectively to refer to the S.F.F.P.C. as amended from time to time and this article as amended from time to time. All references in this article to the South Florida Building Code shall be deemed to refer to the South Florida Building Code as amended from time to time.
